description: Water-resistant suede and high tenacity nylon upper which offers protection and comfort while the Gore-Tex Performance Comfort Footwear guarantees waterproofness and brethability. The revolutionary Duo Asoflex lasting board improve comfort and performance. The outsole package is made of a Pu midsole that offers excellent comfort, support and shock absorption while the Asolo rubber outsole has a self-cleaning design and gives excellent grip on varying types of terrains. To complete the model a toe rubber cap for additional front protection and the hardware lacing system for a fast and precise lace up.
name: Asolo Fugitive GTX MM - Mens
